import sqlite3
import os

DB_PATH = ''/app/database/rag_content.db''
SCHEMA_PATH = ''/app/schema_v8.sql''

# Check if schema file exists
if not os.path.exists\(SCHEMA_PATH\):
    print\(f''Schema file not found: {SCHEMA_PATH}''\)
    print\(''Files in /app:'', os.listdir\(''/app''\)\)
else:
    print\(f''Found schema file: {SCHEMA_PATH}''\)

conn = sqlite3.connect\(DB_PATH\)
cursor = conn.cursor\(\)

# Read and execute schema
with open\(SCHEMA_PATH, ''r''\) as f:
    schema_sql = f.read\(\)

try:
    cursor.executescript\(schema_sql\)
    conn.commit\(\)
    print\(''V8 schema applied successfully''\)
    
    # Verify V8 tables were created
    cursor.execute\(""SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=''table'' AND name LIKE ''v8_%''""\)
    v8_tables = cursor.fetchall\(\)
    print\(f''V8 tables created: {[t[0] for t in v8_tables]}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error applying schema: {e}''\)
finally:
    conn.close\(\)
")
